name: Beak Battle
description:
Beak Battle Retro Bird Fighting Game

Every 100 bird years, there is a battle between the feathered creatures of the earth to decide who will rule the eco systems. The losers must live under the rules of the champions. Some are benevolent, while others are not… Quack
Duck, you have been chosen to represent our kind in this fight. You must give it your all to secure our place so that we remain free to enjoy breadcrumbs in the park and fly where we please. We entrust you with our future and know you will do your best... Quack

Please, support our work if you want more levels and birds! Also we're waiting for your feedback!

Credits: Graphics, Idea, Sound, Music and other: Zachary Helms
